quote-source:
J.A. Konrath (via lonachu)

Weirdly enough, I think I’m going/need to go in the opposite direction : I’ve always been very unconcerned by what people think of me, but maybe that leads to a life that’s peaceful, serene, boring and lonely. There is a reason that my favourite novel is The Year of the Death of Ricardo Reis.
quote-text: One of the greatest journeys in life is overcoming insecurity and learning to truly not give a shit.
